original_text: Your older sister was Samaria. She and her daughters lived north of you. Your younger sister was Sodom. She and her daughters lived south of you.
korean_text: 네 형은 그 딸들과 함께 네 왼쪽에 거주하는 사마리아요 네 아우는 그 딸들과 함께 네 오른쪽에 거주하는 소돔이라

sentences.original_text: She and her daughters lived north of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그녀의 딸들은 너의 북쪽에 살았다.

sentences.original_text: She and her daughters lived south of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그녀의 딸들은 너의 남쪽에 살았다.
